questionsAnswered.title: Your Questions, Answered
questionsAnswered.description: Get quick answers to the most common questions about our platform and services.

faqs.question: What platforms does dima cover?
faqs.answer: dima covers both traditional and social media platforms. Traditional includes: Online Publications, Print Publications, TV & Radio. Social Media includes: TikTok, X, Snapchat, Facebook, Instagram & LinkedIn. There are other sources covered by dima as well like Google Maps Reviews & others in the pipeline. If you don't see the platform you want in the list, contact us to see when it will be available, our team is probably working on it already!

faqs.question: What is the accuracy in Arabic? Does it detect slang, franco and dialects?
faqs.answer: 97% and improving! dima is the first regionally built monitoring platform dedicated to leading agencies and enterprises in the region. As such, it is built to handle Arabic written posts, images and videos at its core

faqs.question: How long does it take to set up an account?
faqs.answer: Once you book a demo, if you like dima, you can be up & running in less than 48 hours, during the demo our team will give you a live tour of dima, answering any questions you may have and then providing you with access to dima where you control users, keywords, topics of interest and reporting 24/7.

faqs.question: Does using dima mean that my data can be leaked to my competitors?
faqs.answer: dima does not share any account's data. Your account data is stored securely and exclusively for your use. Likewise, no current client's data can ever be accessed or shared with another account.

faqs.question: What is the Arabic accuracy for social media listening?
faqs.answer: dima delivers 97% accuracy in Arabic for social media monitoring listening, and that rate is continuously improving. dima is Arabic-first, built in the region to capture dialects, slang, and Franco-Arabic.

faqs.question: What platforms does dima monitor?
faqs.answer: dima covers both traditional and social media platforms. Traditional includes: Online Publications, Print Publications, TV & Radio. Social Media includes: TikTok, X, Snapchat, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn & more. There are other sources covered by dima as well like Google Maps Reviews & others in the pipeline. If you don't see the platform you want in the list, contact us to see when it will be available, our team is probably working on it already!

faqs.question: Is there a limitation on the number of users for the platform?
faqs.answer: No, dima has no limitation on the number of users per single account.

faqs.question: Is there a limitation on the number of reports to be extracted from dima per day/month?
faqs.answer: No, dima has no limitation on the number of reports extracted.

faqs.question: Is there a client view that allows for sharing instant insights, reports, and live monitoring?
faqs.answer: Yes, dima offers different access levels for the expert and the client, providing the client with easy accessibility and the expert with full control.

faqs.question: Can I compare my brand to competitors in the market?
faqs.answer: Yes, dima allows you to compare your brand share of voice, engagement rate, brand Sentiment & brand Emotion to other competitor brands in the market.

faqs.question: Can I track competitor performance on specific topics or campaigns?
faqs.answer: Yes. dima allows you to filter and analyze brand mentions on general market conversations or specific campaigns and topics. This helps you understand how your competitors are positioned in areas that matter most to your business.

faqs.question: Can I view and analyze my competitors' mentions?
faqs.answer: Yes. dima listens to all mentions of interest, allowing you to view, analyze, and filter competitor mentions just as you would with your own brand.

faqs.question: Can I extract social listening data from dima?
faqs.answer: Yes. dima allows you to export your data in three formats: Table Format (raw data for in-depth analysis), Email Format (Quick snapshot reports) and PPT Format (branded, presentation-ready reports). All reports are customizable and tailored to each client's specific needs.

faqs.question: Can I filter data to search & analyze a specific topic, platform, sentiment, etc.?
faqs.answer: Yes. dima gives you full control and accessibility over your data. You can filter results by topic, platform, sentiment, timeframe, and more.

faqs.question: What is the accuracy in Arabic? Does it detect slang, franco and dialects?
faqs.answer: 97% and improving! dima is the first regionally built monitoring platform dedicated to leading agencies and enterprises in the region. As such, it is built to handle Arabic written posts, images and videos at its core

faqs.question: Do I need to share my organization's official social media page credentials?
faqs.answer: No. dima does not require clients to share their social media page credentials. You still receive full insights and analytics without compromising account access.

faqs.question: Can dima help me improve my social media pages' performance?
faqs.answer: Yes. dima helps you analyze your past campaigns and page performance to highlight both strengths and weaknesses. By learning from previous trends, dima guides you to replicate what works, avoid past mistakes, and optimize future content and campaigns for stronger results.

faqs.question: Can I compare my own official pages' performance to my competitors' ?
faqs.answer: Yes, dima allows you to compare your social media pages, campaigns, and posts' performance to your competitors’. You can compare your performance to others by platform, by topics or during a specific date range. <link>Explore more</link>
